channel.title: Need a reliable host!
channel.description:
Hey, I have my server all done. But for some reason, after portforwarding noone can connect, I dunno why, and yes I did it right.
So I basically need someone to host my server... I don't really feel like having to use hamachi... You can be an owner and if the server ever gets donations, you can have a share of them :)
But just don't be a fucktard and just steal my source... its perfect ;)
If interested add my msn (cjolden@googlemail.com) cuz I don't go on these forums much :P

item.title: Need a reliable host!
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

conja:

fucktard

My word.

And, you can’t request a hoster here.

Read full topic
